Body:

{ Message": "ErrorCode:ServerError;InternalServerError"
column10:
temperature:70}'

HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error Content-Length: 155 Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8 Server: Microsoft-HTTPAPI/2.0 iothub-errorcode: ServerError Date: Tue

The SAS should be fine (recreated it several times and I also get authentication error when it is wrong).

I also created I new IoT Hub with a new device to test it without success.

Here are some details about my IoT Hub (sorry

column14:

Body: Ok, the solution is: replace SharedAccessSignature=SharedAccessSignature to just SharedAccessSignature. Thanks!

As Roman Kiss mentioned: replace SharedAccessSignature=SharedAccessSignature to SharedAccessSignature

I don't know why there isn't an authorization issue with that but that works.
